title: File
description: Scene asset file resource. Asset files can be referenced by `uri` or `bufferView` index. `mimeType` is required in the latter case.

uri.description: The uri of the asset file.
uri.gltf_detailedDescription: The uri of the asset file.  Relative paths are relative to the `.gltf` file.  Instead of referencing an external file, the uri can also be a data-uri.

bufferView.description: The index of the bufferView that contains the asset file data. Use this instead of the asset file's uri property.
